rbf.writers.writer



abstract class Writer;
writer class for writing to various ouput formats

package string _previousRecordName;
sometimes, we need to keep track of the previous record written

this(in string outputFileName, in bool create = true);
creates a new Writer object for converting record-based files

Params:
string outputFileName name of the output file (or database name in case of sqlite3)
bool create true if file is created during constructor

Writer writerFactory(in string output, in string mode, Layout layout);
factory method for creating object matching desired format
